Text: Would prefer an AVI or Mp4 file. Seems like the scene has gone to Mp4. I wish you uploaders would stick to one thing. Or let me know how to convert from mkv to mp4. Thanks for the effort though.

@ dukeford57
If you get free download of converterlite just google it,
its real easy to use can convert almost any file into avi, I use it a lot to make avi so I can put to dvd. Cheers
